articles.title: CAR T cell therapy explained: Cancer types, success rate, and more - Medical News Today
articles.description: CAR T cell therapy can treat some types of cancer. Find out which types, how successful it is, the process, and more here.
articles.content:
Chimeric antigen receptor (CAR) T cell therapy is a new type of cancer treatment. During this treatment, healthcare professionals reprogram the immune system to attack cancer cells.
